definition: A subatomic particle with a positive electric charge, typically found in the nucleus of an atom. It is commonly referred to in the context of atomic and nuclear physics, and is a fundamental building block of matter.

examples.german: Das Proton ist ein subatomares Teilchen.
examples.english: The proton is a subatomic particle.

examples.german: Ein Proton besteht aus zwei Up-Quarks und einem Down-Quark.
examples.english: A proton consists of two up quarks and one down quark.
Protons are components of the atomic nucleus.

examples.german: Die Anzahl der Protonen bestimmt das chemische Element.
examples.english: The number of protons determines the chemical element.
